backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and global styles for light/dark modes and romantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting title, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that renders the ValentineInvitePage component.
frontend/src/components/CtaRow.tsx: CTA row with animated Yes/No buttons using shadcn UI.
frontend/src/components/LetterCard.tsx: Animated letter component revealing a long Valentine message line by line.
frontend/src/components/MemoriesMontageS: Empty file placeholder for removed montage scene.
frontend/src/components/OutcomeScene.tsx: Outcome screen showing Yes/No responses with animations and reset/continue actions.
frontend/src/components/ProposalScene.ts: Proposal flow component handling yes/thinking states with animated feedback and reset option.
frontend/src/components/ValentineInviteP: Main page component managing scene transitions, loading animations, and rendering letter, outcomes, and proposal views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and context for storing and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that detects and updates whether the user prefers reduced motion via a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom romantic theme variables plus component styles for the Valentine UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, query client provider, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, containers, animations, and custom romantic theme tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, scope, issues, and current state for the Valentine invitation experience.
